page.title: 04THE UNION CANAL
page.content:
THE{UNION CANAL}RUNS THROUGH THE VILLAGE OF RATHO ON ITS JOURNEY FROM EDINBURGH TO FALKIRK.FIVE MAIN BARGES USE THE CANAL BY RATHO.
THE MAIN BARGE IS THE PRIDE OF THE UNION WHICH IS TEN YEARS OLD AND WEIGHS THIRTY TONS.THE{PRIDE OF THE {UNION}IS A FLOATING RESTAURANT.IT GOES TO WILKIES BASIN FROM THE BRIDGE INN IN RATHO ON ITS SHORT JOURNEY
THE NEXT BARGE TO COME ALONG WAS THE { {STJOHN CRUSADER.}WHICH ORIGINALLY CAME FROM THE ENGLISH CANALS.IT IS OWNED BY THE SEAGULL TRUST..
THE {JANET TELFORD}WAS THE NEXT BARGE.IT WAS BUILT BY TELFORD COLLEGE FOR THE HANDICAPPED.THIS IS ALSO OWNED BY THE SEAGULL TRUST.
